title: isnt vel koz removed from poro king!? why is he still avalible
body: http://puu.sh/dzbCQ/9fddfb2852.jpg check this out this is crazy he is still on today!!

replies.body: why did they atempt or did ban vel koz in poro king?
His abilities would make the map lag.
Inb4 the same exploit that allowed people to pick Ryze in URF. If its not a custom he'll most likely be banned.
Riot probably dun' goofed. You could pick Ryze in URF because Riot forgot to ban him permanently. Best part is I still lost that one game, with Ryze, in a normals.
Its not an exploit, i could just pick him when played a game just before.

> [{quoted}](name=xXDarkAngelXx550,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=OYRyUyuA,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2014-12-18T03:28:28.408+0000)
>
> Its not an exploit, i could just pick him when played a game just before.

So either Riot %%%%ed up, or it's an exploit.. one of the two.

ORRRRR the issue was fixed.
It'd be an exploit, same %%%% happens all the time and then the people that play the banned champion brag about it and tell you you're an idiot for thinking the champ is banned.
